name: eshop-microservices
description: E-commerce microservices application built with .NET Core

scripts.build: echo 'This is a .NET project. Please use: dotnet build src/eshop-microservices.sln'
scripts.test: echo 'This is a .NET project. Please use: dotnet test src/eshop-microservices.sln'
scripts.setup: echo 'EShop Microservices - Development environment configured for information server'
scripts.info: echo 'This is a .NET Core microservices project. Use Docker for full functionality:'
scripts.docker:up: cd src && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml up -d
scripts.docker:down: cd src && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml down

author: Mehmet Ozkaya
